sentences.sentence: Meanwhile, Israeli soldiers raided the Nur Sham's refugee camp outside the West Bank city of Tal Qam.

sentences.sentence: The Israeli military released a video of the raid saying over 20 wanted persons were arrested and over 12 terrorists were eliminated.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: More than 4,100 Palestinians have been killed by the Israeli military since the war began, the health ministry in Gaza said, and over 13,000 people have been injured.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: On Thursday, Israel destroyed a Greek Orthodox church in Gaza City, the oldest church still in use in the Gaza Strip.

sentences.sentence: Its military said it had targeted a Hamas command center nearby.

sentences.sentence: The health ministry said 16 Palestinians were killed. Despite all the martyrs, their blood has been shed. Now the blood of Islam and the blood of Christians is dripping.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03

sentences.sentence: Many of Biden's shared priorities with the EU depend on getting a budget through Congress, and that's a tough task given that the House lacks an elected speaker and Republican divisions over 8 for Ukraine could force a federal government shutdown in November.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Police in Warsaw have arrested a 22-year-old man over a bizarre series of thefts in a shopping centre in the Polish capital, which left security guards scratching their heads.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: After slipping into a clothes shop once the building was closed, police said the man put on new clothes then froze in the shop window, pretending to be an exhibition mannequin.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Before being arrested, he still had time to steal jewellery from a stand set up in one of the galleries.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The man has been remanded in custody and faces a ten-year prison sentence.
